LanguageData.MS.DelayRangeTooltip: Base raid arrival time after it has been discovered
LanguageData.MS.EdgeWalkInGroups: Walking in form the edge(in groups)
LanguageData.MS.EdgeDropGroups: Drop podding at the edge(in groups)
LanguageData.MS.multiplier: Below 1 will reduce the delay for specific arrival method, above will increase it
